title: Test Flora Watermelon Festival Details Announced
full_story: The annual Flora Watermelon Festival is set to return this August. Organizers have confirmed a record number of vendors and the return of the popular seed-spitting contest. Local businesses are encouraged to sign up for booth space by the end of the month.

title: Test Louisville School Board Discusses New Budget
full_story: The Louisville School Board met Monday night to discuss the upcoming fiscal year budget. Key topics included facility upgrades and new technology initiatives for the elementary school. Public comment is invited at the next scheduled meeting.

title: Test Clay City High School Basketball Victory
full_story: The Clay City basketball team secured a thrilling victory last night in the final seconds of the game. The team showed incredible defense, leading to a 54-52 win. The next game is scheduled for Friday night away.
